SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.network.client

Interface RemoteConnection

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionRMI
public interface RemoteConnection extends Remote
Interface that the Client expose to the Server. It contains methods to keep the client alive and receive responses

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    heartBeat()
    This method is called by the server every X seconds, to let the server know that this client is still connected.
    void
    sendMessage(BaseResponseData response)
    This method is called by the Server when it has to broadcast a message, it just saves the response in the queue, then in another thread the response is processed.

  • Method Details

    • heartBeat

      void heartBeat() throws RemoteException
      This method is called by the server every X seconds, to let the server know that this client is still connected.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - As defined in remote interfaces

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(BaseResponseData response) throws RemoteException
      This method is called by the Server when it has to broadcast a message, it just saves the response in the queue, then in another thread the response is processed. This removes the synchronous response and so speed up the Server.
      Parameters:
      response - the response forwarded
      Throws:
      RemoteException - As defined in Remote interface
